songs.title: Only Wanna Dance With You (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm so over it with love
Every guy just super sucks
They just lie and take my stuff
But it doesn't matter
Thought tonight would be mellow
Just went out to see a show
You walked in and now woah-oh
Now it doesn't matter

[Pre-Chorus]
You said to me
"Come let me see
The stars in your eyes"

[Chorus]
It's all I wanna do
I only wanna dance with you
Whatever I got to do
I want you to myself tonight, alright
I only wanna dance with you

[Verse 2]
I'm not asking for a thing
I'm not looking for a ring
I don't need to know your name
No, it doesn't matter
I don't think you understand
I've been dancing with my hand
And I kinda need a man
So, it doesn't matter

[Pre-Chorus 2]
I said to you
"I'm about to
Blow your pretty mind"

[Chorus]

[Interlude]
Just wanna dance with you
Just wanna dance with you
Just wanna dance with you
Oh, oh, oh

[Breakdown]
I like your steez, I think you're alright
Come to my place, let's kick it all night
And hardcore make out till it gets light
Alright
Don't give a fuck about other dudes
But I can't keep my hands off you
I only wanna dance with you
Alright

[Chorus]

[Interlude] [x2]

[Outro]
I only wanna dance with you
